title: Insertion Index in Sorted Array
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of JavaScript programming. Through a series of exercises and challenges, we will cover topics such as data types, variables, functions, and control flow. By the end of this lab, you will have a strong foundation in JavaScript programming and be equipped with the skills to tackle more advanced concepts. Get ready to dive into the exciting world of JavaScript!
